bibl.title: The nouus codex and the codex repetitae praelectionis: Justinian and his Codes. Avec résumés en français et en anglais.
bibl.note: Justinian's Code built on existing codes, but superseded them. Major legal changes after its First Edition in 529 meant that a Second Edition had to be produced in 534. Only P. Oxy. XV, 1814 [= M.-P.3 2969; LDAB 6324], a papyrus index for part of Book I of the First Edition, enables explicit comparison, revealing important details about the processes of addition, deletion, substitution and relocation of constitutions.
